description:

Our allocation has sold out, please try these links:

Limited edition two-track 7” on white vinyl released via the new Dutch 'Snowflakes Christmas Singles Club'. 
Catalogue number "SNOWFLAKE1"
 
Hand-signed & dispatched December 1st

a. Simple Feeling
b. I Wonder As I Wander

Limited to 500 copies worldwide

name: Double-CD Edition "Ghosts"
description:
This retrospective 2xCD release features Smoke Fairies' limited, long-sold-out 7" singles on disc one - the ‘Frozen Heart EP’, their debut single ‘Living With Ghosts’ and the amazing ‘Sunshine’ single. Previously available on vinyl-only in North America or on the band's US tour with Laura Marling in 2010.

CD2 or 'Ghosts II' is a complete bonus disc of early studio sessions from 2007–08.  These tracks were only ever sold at gigs or have never been released at all. Included is the sublime ‘Good Man’ along with other early classics, all recorded before their acclaimed 2011 debut album, Through Low Light and Trees.

Tracklisting: 

GHOSTS I:
-Sunshine
-When You Grow Old
-Living With Ghosts
-Troubles
-Frozen Heart
-Fences
-Morning Light
-We Had Lost Our Minds
-He’s Moving On

GHOSTS II:
-The Water Waits 
-Bones 
-Another Night 
-Riverbed 
-Good Man 
-I Get So Lonely
-Tonight 
-The Road Is Long
-Sea Shanty II

name: *SOLD OUT* UK Tour 2012 Screen Printed Poster
description:
Limited Edition 100-run poster sold exclusively on the band's UK tour in Sept/Oct 2012. 
As promised a handful were held back to be sold online for those unable to attend the dates. 

A2 size, 2-colour screen print, drawn & designed by Jessica & Katherine.

Sent rolled in good quality postage tube.

name: Vinyl (Marbled) - Ghosts: A Compilation of A-Sides, B-Sides and an EP from the Recent Past (USA only
description:
Ghosts: A Compilation of A-Sides, B-Sides and an EP from the Recent Past (USA only release). Ltd Edition on marbled coloured vinyl.

We have a few for you here on import. 12" Vinyl format only. 

Comes with a digital download code (including the exclusive song "Riverbed").
Compiles the Living With Ghosts & Sunshine singles with the Frozen Heart EP tracks.

(Initial pressing of 500 on split coloured (half black/half white) vinyl now Sold Out)

name: 'Ghosts' Compilation Lyrics Book
description: Matching the 'Through Low Light and Trees' lyric book included in the deluxe album box-set, this compact (11cm x9cm) lyric book has also been put together by the band, featuring the lyrics from all 9 songs on the Ghosts compilation.

Both tracks were produced by Jack White and feature him on drums and his band mate Jack Lawrence on bass.

name: *SOLD OUT* Ltd Edition Store Exclusive 'Blood Speaks' Box Set
description:
The Smoke Fairies 'Blood Speaks' Box Set exclusively from Smokefairies.com. Limited to 200 worldwide

Packaged in 17cm-square tin box: 
This exclusive online release includes the deluxe version of the BLOOD SPEAKS album on CD inc bonus tracks, 10 silk screen prints designed by the band, an exclusive Lyric book, 2 original one-off photos taken by Jessica and Katherine themselves, a poster, a retro-style Smoke Fairies camera and some other surprises. The box comes with a hand-numbered certificate of authenticity signed by Jessica and Katherine and will be delivered to you on, or as close to, release date as the postal services will allow.

Packed safe & secure + sent recorded delivery in the UK

name: *SOLD OUT* Limited Stock - The Three Of Us EP 9" Record Store Day Exclusive
description:

Limited to 500 for Record Store Day 2012

A1 - The Three Of Us
A2 - Radio Clicks On
B1 - Bells
B2 - The Wireless

On Sale Now whilst stocks last

name: *SOLD OUT* UK Tour Exclusive 7" Alabama / Strange Moon Rising
description:
A:   Strange Moon Rising (radio edit)
AA: Alabama 

We've pressed a very limited edition of the record and chosen white vinyl to look like a giant full moon. 
You'll only be able to get it from us on the UK tour & any stocks left will be added to the web-shop from 4th Feb. 
The 7" will also slip inside the outer sleeve of the ‘Strange Moon Rising’ 7" single alongside the other record released 24th January.

name: *SOLD OUT* Deluxe 'Through Low Light And Trees' Ltd Edition Store Exclusive
description:
The Limited Edition Box 

The Smoke Fairies deluxe version of the Through Low Light and Trees album is available exclusively from Smokefairies.com

The box is handmade in wood with a screen-printed lid, inside the box comes the limited version of the CD itself with mini gatefold sleeve, An A2 silkscreen cut into 16 x A6 two-colour mini prints designed and executed by the Smoke Fairies. Lyric book containing all the lyrics to the songs on the album and an exclusive signed photograph of Katherine and Jessica. (each picture in each box is actually different and unique and is taken using a Fuji Instax camera)

There are strictly 100 of these boxes and each will be hand numbered on the base.
